title: Gold 5 Team LF top laner and adc
body:
Add demonsiayer if you are keen to play ranked 5 in my Gold 5 team. 

Please you must have skype and be active and must be willing to make friends with the team and commit to it!!! =)

Preferably looking for gold/plat players !

replies.body: havent done placements but last season gold 3, i am happy to trial and leave if you need people with a higher skill cap
